mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.id FROM users u JOIN chat_members m ON u.id = m.user_id WHERE m.chat_id IN ( SELECT chat_id FROM chat_members WHERE user_id = #{Id} )

SELECT m.chat_id, c.chat_code, m.user_id, u.u_id, u.nickname, u.avatar_object, m.last_seen_at, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM chats c JOIN ( chat_members m JOIN users u ON m.user_id = u.id ) ON c.id = m.chat_id WHERE m.chat_id IN (SELECT chat_id FROM chat_members cm WHERE cm.user_id = #{userId})

SELECT m.chat_id, c.chat_code, m.user_id, u.u_id, u.nickname, u.avatar_object, m.last_seen_at, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM chats c JOIN chat_members m ON c.id = m.chat_id JOIN users u ON m.user_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{chatId}
